data.eml:eml: Sphincterochilidae from Tunisia, with a note on the subgenus Rima Pallary, 1910 (Gastropoda, Pulmonata)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Abbes, Intidhar, Nouira, Said, Neubert, Eike (2011): Sphincterochilidae from Tunisia, with a note on the subgenus Rima Pallary, 1910 (Gastropoda, Pulmonata). ZooKeys 151: 1-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.151.2264, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.151.2264
